document.title: Hot Topic: Public Acts Affecting Cities
document.abstract: The 2001 Tennessee General Assembly passed into law several acts that affect Tennessee municipalities. This Hot Topic summarizes some of these acts. However, do not rely solely on these summaries before giving advice or taking action. Refer to the act itself. MTAS will publish the complete 2001 Tennessee Public Acts this month.
